## hpr1545 :: 32 - LibreOffice Calc - Introduction to Charts and Graphs

 There are many Charts and Graphs available in LibreOffice Calc, but choosing the right one makes a difference. In this episode we review your options and help you to make the right choice.

https://www.amazon.com/The-Visual-Display-Quantitative-Information/dp/0961392142/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1397151192&sr=8-1&keywords=Tufte
https://www.numberphile.com/videos/infographic.html
https://www.ted.com/talks/hans_rosling_shows_the_best_stats_you_ve_ever_seen
https://www.ted.com/talks/david_mccandless_the_beauty_of_data_visualization
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bubble_chart
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radar_chart
https://simplystatistics.org/2012/11/26/the-statisticians-at-fox-news-use-classic-and-novel-graphical-techniques-to-lead-with-data/
https://www.ahuka.com/?page_id=772
